definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: overshadow, screen, cover (‖ √ to I. [[שׂכך]] (which is prob. orig., cf. Ar. 4ak=a, and Frä:90); NH [[הֵסֵיח]] cover, and perh. [[סִכֵּךְ]] roof over);—

screen, cover, usu. co. [[עַל־]] of thing covered, 1Ki 8:7, 1Ch 28:18; + acc. of covering Ex 40:3 (P); + [[בְּ]] of covering Ex 25:20, Ex 37:9 (both P); c. [[לְ]] of thing covered Ps 140:8; so (+ [[בְּ]] instr.) [[בֶּעָנׇן לָךְ]] ´[[ס]] La 3:44 thou hast screened thyself with the clouds; c. acc. Job 40:22 lotus-trees, as its shade, screen it; abs. Ez Eze 28:14, Eze 28:16 (difficult, text prob. corrupt, Co Toy del. as gloss).
reflex. cover oneself [[בָאַף]] ´[[ס]] La 3:43 thou hast covered (clothed, panoplied) thyself with anger (si vera l.; cf. v:La 3:44 supr..).
specif. c. [[אֶת־רַגְלָיו]], i.e. with long garments, euphemism for evacuating the bowels, from posture assumed, so inf. Ju Jdg 3:24, pt. 1Sa 24:4 (cf. NH [[הֵסֵיח]], and v. GFM, HPS).

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: (expl. as Qal Ba:ZMG xliii (1889), 178), c. [[עַל־]] Ex 40:21, of protection Ps 5:12; c. [[לְ]] pers. + [[בְּ]] instr. Ps 91:4 (of protection).
